title: Researchers Demonstrate How MCP Prompt Injection Can Be Used for Both Attack and Defense
description: As the field of artificial intelligence (AI) continues to evolve at a rapid pace, new research has found how techniques that render the Model Context Protocol (MCP) susceptible to prompt injection attacks could be used to develop security tooling or identify malicious tools, according to a new report from Tenable.
